description:
Subaru was a middle school girl who loved stargazing, but she was the only member of the astronomy club. Her childhood friend, Aoi, was now commuting to a different school, and their relationship had grown distant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bulletin météore : Alternance entre pluie et étoiles filantes
Meteor Shower Forecast: Rain with Occasional Shooting Stars
流星予報: 雨時々流れ星
